HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to compress your video
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Click on save to download your video

FAQ.question: Can I compress my videos using Video Compressor?
FAQ.answer: Video Compressor allows you to compress Video files of any format. You only have to upload your video, select the encoding speed and CRF value and click on save. You file will be compressed as per your desired size.

FAQ.question: How long will it take to upload my video?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to upload your video for cropping or editing depends on the size of your video. Better quality videos with higher resolution will take more time to upload as compared to low quality videos with lesser resolution.

FAQ.question: What is CRF value?
FAQ.answer: Constant rate factor (CRF) is an encoding mode that adjusts the file data rate up or down to achieve a selected quality level rather than a specific data rate. CRF values range from 0 to 51, with lower numbers delivering higher quality scores.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my videos decrease after compressing?
FAQ.answer:
When you compress a file, the file size will be reduced and to do that, the quality has to be cmpromised. To make sure that you do not lose out the qualily, Video Compressor allows you to choose the quality of the video as per your requirement. If you want high quality video, you can choose a higher resolution and the file size will be bigger. But if you care about the size of the file and can compromise in the size then chose a lesser resolution.
Video Compressor also allows you to choose the CRF value, which means you can choose the resolution and the CRF value as per your need.
CRF values lie from 0-1, where a lower CRF provides better compression and quality.

FAQ.question: What are the resolutions available and what will be the size of the file of different resolutions?
FAQ.answer: Video Compressor provides all the standard resolutions i.e., 1080p, 720p, 480p, 360p, and 240p. Keep in mind that a higher resolution file size will be more than a file with lower resolution. The size of the file will also depend on the length of the video, the resolution, the aspect ratio and the CRF values.

FAQ.question: What are encoding speeds?
FAQ.answer:
Video Compressor allows you to choose encoding speed i.e., the speed at which you want to convert the video and save it for download. The encoding speeds available with Video Compressor are ultrafast, superfast, very fast, faster, Fast, medium, slow, slower, very slow.
The slower the speed the better is the compression. Video Compressor provides a wide range of encoding speeds according to varying needs of our users and ensures to provide the best quality videos for each edit made by the user.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use Video compressor?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to use Video compressor?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is 100% safe to use the Video compressor, as we do not save your files, and there are no third-party ads on the website. Your data will be safe and secure with us.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.

FAQ.question: Can I download the file after compressing in any other format?
FAQ.answer: Video Compressor allows you to edit your videos as per your need and requirements providing multiple attributes and functions. You can download the edited video in the original format of your video. However, you can use our other websites like Video Converter, to finally convert your video in your desired format.
